name: True or false - new
description:
"True or false" is not just a popular quiz. It is a game world that combine knowledge from different categories.

DESCRIPTION

We have prepared for you many amazing facts from popular categories. Do you want to test your knowledge in areas such as popular people, geography or animals? You will certainly like our game!

Develop your intuition. During the game player often have to guess what's in front of him - truth or fiction.

We are sure that it will be very interesting to check which amazing facts are true actually!

FROM THE AUTHORS

You may help to make our games better! So please feel free to give us your feedback. We will respect your wishes. We make our games for you!
